content: Should we remove or alter section 16, which discusses conferences? I'm torn, but somewhat inclined to "just leave it", because I'm trying to avoid adding stress to my life in terms of having to synchronize more changes. =)
I had the same thought about that section, then did not comment because we are on a strict budget for this survey. So, for me, I'd leave it as it is.
Uh, seeing this late. Maybe @Flaki is interested in adding 1-2 questions around online experiences.
Happy to follow up for discussing a revamp etc for next year's edition (once y'all finished dealing with this year's, ofc :sparkling_heart:)
